Name: VariDungeon
About the game: In VariDungeon, you are a hero exploring a dungeon. It may sound classic, but each run is different because its structure changes every time you start again ! Power-ups, enemies, bosses, traps, ... You need to adapt to all these elements in order to defeat the final boss and save the King ! Features : - Gorgeous pixel-art graphics in the style of Game Boy - 13 enemies that get stronger as you so - 12 power-ups to combine in order to win each fight - 4 bosses trying to kill you - More environments, enemies, power-ups, playable characters and bosses to come in themed updates !
